name: ajac Web Design
description:
ajac Web Design is a web-design/development company based in Canton, MI. We pride ourselves on thinking local and acting global. Our goal as a company is to provide the highest quality large business web-sites at small business affordable rates.Â 
We also specialize in SEO (search engine optimization) work. Having a web-site is a great start, but it will never make you money unless people can find it. ajac specializes in getting your site found.
